import React from 'react' import './ExpenseForm.css' function ExpenseForm() { const [userInput,setUserInput] = R const [enteredTitle,setEnteredTitle] = React.useState('') const [enteredAmount,setEnteredAmount] = React.useState('') const [enteredDate,setEnteredDate] = React.useState('') const titleChangeHandler = (e)=>{ console.log(e) setEnteredTitle(e.target.value) } const dateChangeHandler = (e)=>{ setEnteredAmount(e.target.value) } const amountChangeHandler =(e)=>{ setEnteredDate(e.target.value) } return (



) } export default ExpenseForm
